com.alexdiru.redleaf

Class ColourScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexdiru.redleaf.ColourScheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisposable

    public class ColourScheme
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisposable
    Represents a colour scheme for the song Different assets will be loaded for the graphics depending on the theme chosen
    Author:
    Alex
